评论详情: These necklaces are so cute and I will be wearing them all the time. They fit perfectly and look nice but I do want to say, that they do not layer perfectly like shown in the pictures if you are planning on layering them. However, they look really good by themselves.
i really love the little star necklace. good quality for what you pay! they’re small, i wish they were different lengths because you can’t really pair them together like the picture shows

My daughter asked for a red star necklace for her birthday and we picked this one out. It is nice enough for a child but the carnelian we received is not dark/bright red like in the product image--it is sort of half orange and half yellow.

评论概述: It is not like the picture
评论详情: The charms are right but the lengths are off and the necklace isn’t combined as one, it’s two separate necklaces, which wasn’t mentioned before. Do not recommend getting this if you want it to look like the picture.. and if you want it to be one necklace.

I don’t buy a lot of costume jewelry, but this caught my witchy attention. The spiral is a powerful symbol, and this one is nicely designed—a bit organic in shape. Amethysts are known to promote peace, inner wisdom, and protection, and we all could use as much of those gifts as we can get! The star is nicely made, and the “mount” to the black cord is well done. I’m quite happy with this necklace. It hangs next to my computer when I’m not wearing it.
The stone star is more orange than red on our pendant. Other than that it is cute and seems well made. The chain latches are secure and the leather is soft.
This necklace double is really nice. It is solid and well made. Perfect for any teenager or hippie type person. Great gift.
